spec_data.Name: portaudio-devel
spec_data.Description:
PortAudio is a portable audio I/O library designed for cross-platform
support of audio. It uses a callback mechanism to request audio processing.
Audio can be generated in various formats, including 32 bit floating point,
and will be converted to the native format internally.

This package contains files required to build applications that will use the
portaudio library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 04:36:48 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development files for the portaudio audio I/O library
